review: I would of given this 5 stars for ease of use and quick response to searches but it suffers from the same issue as the Fire TV. Voice search is only available for shows on Amazon and not Netflix. If Amazon corrects this flaw and makes voice search available for all the streaming services they cover this will be the perfect tool. Make it happen Amazon!
author: Jeffery A Dolan

review: The stick pretty much works as described.  I bought the stick specifically because it says it will soon have two important features:  1.  Coming soon--take Fire TV Stick with you to use with HDTVs in hotels, college dorms, or anywhere with captive portal Internet access that requires entering a password or a log-in.  2.  HBO GO - Coming spring 2015I wonder when these features will happen.  Soon, I hope.========================Well, progress by baby steps.  The HBO Go (item 2 above) became available on the Fire TV stick on March 18, 2015.  I downloaded and installed the app and it works.Not that Amazon did anything to let me know of its finally supporting the HBO Go feature on the stick.  I learned about it completely by accident.But as of right now the "log in at a hotel" feature that was promised (item 1 above) is still not available.  This despite the false claim as of today that the feature is available on the Fire TV Stick.
author: carl oppedahl

review: I use this on the bedroom TV.  I like that it is small and compact.  I have noticed a difference is speed loading.  It is a little slower than the fire box.  I don't mind it at all.  It doesn't have the apps available as the fire box, however, it is just what I was looking for.  I have had to reset it a few times, however, I think that is because of our internet.  Good value, highly recommend
